name: deducible
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
able to be deduced (= answered or decided by thinking carefully about the known facts): What facts are reasonably deducible from the evidence? Certain character traits are deducible from his conversational behaviour. See
deduce
More examplesFewer examplesThere is no rationally deducible connection between the two facts.Mathematical truths are deducible by reason alone.What conclusion is deducible from what he says?
